short_summary: Purchase of office furniture for the Government of Canada
description: This purchase is part of the Procurement of Office Furniture for the Government of Canada. The task is to purchase and deliver office furniture according to a specified timeline.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Official Government Tender Announcement**

**Notice Title:** EB129-232045 Office Furniture - PSPC Co-Working, Moncton NB

**Reference Number:** WS3991165256-Doc4012988920

**Publication Date:** May 26, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 15, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (AST)

**Background**
------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) issues this Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) in accordance with Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. The tender covers the product category 6 (Support Space - Collaborative Furniture) of the SA, as well as non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) products.

**Tender Details**
----------------

The PSPC requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the Co-working space in Moncton, New Brunswick, on or before July 25, 2023. This procurement is open to suppliers who are pre-qualified and hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA).

**Eligibility**
--------------

To be eligible to bid, suppliers must:

1. Possess a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C
2. Meet the requirements outlined in the NPP
3. Not be barred from bidding on this contract due to previous non-compliance with PSPC regulations

**Additional Information**
------------------------

For suppliers who are not pre-qualified SA holders, this NPP provides the opportunity to submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. Suppliers who are not eligible to bid may still submit a proposal to the Identified User (IU) for consideration.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For further information, please contact:
Kristelle LeBlanc (PSPC)
kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that only suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria and provide the required documentation shall be considered for award.

**Notice URL**
---------------

To access the tender documents, please visit:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16401655?extsite=MTY0MDE2NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This tender announcement supersedes any previously issued amendments.

I added more readable headers to enhance the reading experience, and cleaned up the text making the language more polished and concise
